name: Solfa Cipher
description:
The player is provided with an image of a WW2 rotatory decoder and a background image of a hill. The player will have to decrypt it to get the first hint. 
 Player is then provided with a zipped file containing an audio and a document. Decrypt it to get the final answer.

questions.title: Solfa Cipher
questions.description:
The rotatory encoder isn't the only element. Look beyond the background. Some might agree that the limit is beyond the sun. 
 https://solfa-cipher-acm.netlify.app/
questions.hint: Cipher name is related to the background of the homepage. For the audio related hints, check our Instagram post on what is cryptic hunt.
